modName: Ducks and Co. Mounts and Followers
summary: With this mod, you can mount Ducks, Geese, Pheasants, Flamingo, Seagull, Pigeon, Great Auk, Peacock, wherever you want in the world of skyrim … No Dlc needed
descriptionHtml:
[b]With this mod, you can mount Ducks, Geese, Pheasants, Flamingo, Seagull, Pigeon, Great Auk, Peacock, wherever you want in the world of skyrim … [/b] … No Dlc needed

[b][i]New Sounds (real sounds)[/i][/b]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/vZ3vTlD.gif[/img]

[b]SUMMONABLE MOUNTS[/b]


You have 24 Summonable Mounts* (31 different birds*)

To have the SUMMONABLE Mounts, you must buy the 24 “Spell tome: summon XX”, at [b]Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach[/b]/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Birds"

In order to buy the 25 books at Farengar, [b][i]you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game[/i][/b]


* List of Birds :

Female Shelduck with his duckling
Female Mallard with his duckling
Female Wigeon with his duckling
Female Chicken with his chick
Two Geese
Two Hammerfell's Geese
Two Sea Geese
Valenwood Runner Goose
Rooster
Male Shelduck
Male Wood Duck
Male Mallard
Male Mandarin Duck
Male Maccoa Duck
Male Philippine Duck
Male Green Pheasant
Male White Eared Pheasant
Male Palawan Peacock Pheasant
Male (common) Pheasant
Seagull
Pigeon
Flamingo
Peacock
Great Auk


If problem with the mounts you can try a Fast Travel


These birds (and others!) are also in my mods [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91417/] Farm Animals and Co. Extended Version [/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91142/?] Farm Animals and Co. [/url] and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89775] Repopulate Skyrim with Farm Animals and Birds [/url]


You have also in this mod a "Peacock with Open Tail", BUT it is a bad mount (screen) ! … In the console (only), type: player.placeatme 2545D1D7 or 2545D1DF


[b]CREDITS [/b]


Mihail Romanov for some birds (Chick, Bantam Chicken, Ducklings, Ducks, Rooster, Pheasants) in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89772/] Pheasants Ducks and Chickens- Elements of Skyrim pt.13 (mihail immersive add-ons- animal- birds) [/url], for the Pigeon in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89548] Pigeons- Elements of Skyrim pt.12 (mihail immersive add-ons- birds)[/url], for the Seagull in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89528/] Seagulls -Elements of Skyrim pt.10 (mihail immersive add-ons- birds) [/url], for the Great Auk in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88927] Chub Loons - Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- ESO - birds) [/url], for the Geese in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91998/] Geese and Hammerfell Fowls- Elements of Skyrim pt.15 (mihail immersive add-ons- birds) [/url], For the Flamingo in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88066/] Flamingos - Elements of Skyrim pt. 6 (mihail immersive add-ons - birds) [/url], and for the Peacock in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81868/?] Peacocks- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- animals- birds) [/url] ("Feel free to use my mod in your projects, no need to ask me for permission first")

Free sounds : [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/] universal-soundbank[/url] - [url=http://www.sound-fishing.net/bruitages_animaux.html] Sound Fishing [/url] - [url=http://lasonotheque.org/] lasonotheque [/url] - [url=http://soundbible.com/] soundbible [/url] - [url=http://www.freesfx.co.uk] freesfx [/url] - [url=http://www.xeno-canto.org/]xeno-canto[/url] - [url=https://www.hbw.com/ibc] The Internet IBC Bird Collection [/url]


[b][i]Presentation of this mod with my birds (from 4'36'' to 5'30'')[/i]:[/b]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]H5BVQUt1cTc[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-
